name: Robodomo
headline: IoT automation framework for developers
description: Robodomo creates a universal interface for communicating with the fragmented market of IoT vendors. Using the simplicity of MQTT messages, IoT devices can interact, follow automation patterns, feed data lakes, and learn from external data. Think of it as IoT devices tweeting each other messages to influence behavior.

meta.name: keywords
meta.content: iot, robodomo, home automation, iot automation, node, mqtt

content.title: Keep Pull Requests Within Performance Budgets
